name: Exploding Fat Heads
description: A fun and challenging app game for all ages and hours of fun for the whole family. The aim is to flick food in Fat Head's mouth. Watch him turn into an expanding, bald, pimple face and hear lots of burps and farts along the way until his face explodes. You have limited time to flick food in the mouth of Fat Heads to watch them explode. As you progress there are more faces to explode in limited time to get to the next stage. You can challenge family and friends to see who can complete the levels first.
